text: 8.38-39: Ef 1.21; Kor 1.16; 2.15; 1 Pi 3.22Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira won ndavar nza nɨɨŋgim, gu khueŋ khothɨgi, bigɨna the Fhe Bakɨme vuzvuga thugɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Nza rimgirga o, nza ŋamki o, Fhe Bakɨme enseri o, tori gu ŋiniŋgi havhari o, ntige khar ki bigi o, zumgu hɨrga bigi o, mbarkɨrga bigi nta ŋkasŋka ki o, kha vun ki bigi o, kha nɨɨn nuianan ki bigi o, mbar tamtam khar ki bigi, mba bigi, nta zam, nta Fhe Bakɨme wo ndavar nza nɨɨŋgi vuzvuga thugɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ana wo ndavar nza nɨɨŋgi vuzvuk, ana nza Bakɨme Krais Zisas muuŋgi ŋaarar panan, ana wo ndavar nza nɨɨŋgi vuzvugar nza khɨvigi.
